title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: Files in the MRU list are not appearing in the File menu between sessions.
EB: The MRU list should persist the files between sessions.
SR: Implement the IPersistableElement to properly persist the MRU list. Do not access the underlying resource directly through implementation details. Note that the IEditorInput may not necessarily be a resource.
